info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 28 at 4:27PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...LINE OF SHOWERS LIFTING NORTHEAST INTO THE WOOD RIVER VALLEY THROUGH 530 PM MDT... At 424 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of showers 11 miles southwest of Galena Lodge to near Fairfield to 15 miles southeast of Corral, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts to 30 mph along with valley rain and mountain snow. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hailey, Ketchum, Sun Valley, Little Wood Reservoir, Bellevue, Galena Lodge, Gannett, Galena Summit, Herd Lake and Twin Bridges Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
